name: 張瑋倫
objective:
This course provides the knowledge you need to understand the role of information systems in modern organizations, with particular focus on E-commerce and E-business. Along with skills learned in your functional area, knowledge from this course will help you effectively use information technology for solving business problems
1. Understand the concept of information technology and management.
2. Understand the application of information technology and management (e.g., business process re-engineering, enterprise resource planning, customer relationship management, and supply chain management).
3. Analyze famous cases of information technology and management (e.g., Metro Group for SCM).
4. Apply and evaluate the cases of information technology and management by case analysis.
